itemdesc-carrotbundle: A small bundle of carrots for taming! Horses like these!
itemdesc-haybundle: A bundle of dry grass used for taming. Horses will eat these!
itemdesc-horsesaddle: A sturdy leather saddle for your steed, with saddlebags!
horsetamingguide-text: A Guide to Horse Taming: -----by Verlia Taming a horse is fairly simple! First, you will need to find a food that horses will enjoy! Dry grass is a good start, but other foods will be preferred. Try out a variety! Right clicking a wild horse with a compatible food item will start the taming process. Each feed will increase taming percentage until the process is complete. Now you can name your new horse! Feeding your horse after taming is complete will increase its obedience, so when you give it a command it will be more inclined to listen. --Now you're ready for adventure!-- Mount up on your new horse by right clicking on it! An empty hand is needed. Dismount your horse by sneaking/crouching. Horses can eat from troughs and breed just like other domesticated animals. Some of their favorite foods are carrots, apples, and grains, and each will affect them differently! Keep an eye out for more saddles, saddlebags, and attachments in the future!
